verses.name: John 15:22
verses.text: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloke for their sin.

verses.name: John 15:23
verses.text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.

verses.name: John 15:24
verses.text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.

verses.name: John 15:25
verses.text: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
